name: Hotel Montfleuri

reviews.title: Small friendly hotel
reviews.text: We have just returned from 3 nights at this hotel and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Our room was at the back of the hotel on the fifth floor and although a bit small was spotlessly clean and very comfortable.
reviews.title: A Modern Boutique Hotel close to Arc de Triomphe

description: The Montfleuri hotel welcoms it's guest into a charming, cosy , luxurious and personalized decor.Just a step from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees, this 4 star hotel, got his name after one of Napoleon’s battle in Italy. Constantly evolving in terms of comfort and equipments, and benefiting of its privileged location, the Montfleuri knows how to satisfy businessman as well as the tourists.
